subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: Due to {{w|Han unification}}, this Unicode character appears as {{lang|zh|蝉}} ({{lang|zh|虫单}}) in PRC-style fonts and {{lang|ja|蝉}} ({{lang|ja|虫単}}) in Japan-style fonts.

subSections.title: Compounds

Noun
Synonyms
subSections.text: * {{sense|flute part}} {{ja-r|蝉口|せみぐち}} {{ja-r|蝉本|せみもと}}
